name: Althea, Inc.
description: Operator of an online e-commerce marketplace designed to offer beauty products. The company's platform offers skincare, makeup, cleanser, face packs, masks and other beauty products, enabling consumers to buy comprehensive skin beauty selections at low prices.
one_liner: Operator of an online e-commerce marketplace designed to offer beauty products. The company's platform offers skincare, makeup, cleanser, face packs, masks and other beauty products, enabling consumers to buy comprehensive skin beauty selections at low prices.
